Cloud Services & Automation

As a seasoned Software Engineer specializing in data automation, I've successfully led projects migrating terabytes of data, developed applications that streamlined operations for over 60,000 users, and engineered complex ETL pipelines across numerous Azure tenants. My background in Electronics and Computer Engineering, combined with a passion for data science, fuels my commitment to building efficient, scalable, and impactful solutions. I thrive in collaborative environments, leveraging my Scrum Master certification to guide teams to success.

Professional Experience

My career journey in building robust data solutions.

July 2022 – Aug 2024

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Architected and implemented a scalable ETL pipeline for 38 Azure tenants using Python and Azure Data Factory, centralizing data for compliance and reporting.
  • Led a 6-engineer team as Scrum Master for a multi-national SharePoint data migration, delivering the project ahead of schedule.
  • Developed a PowerApps solution with SQL Stored Procedures, automating data entry across 146 office locations.
  • Automated the migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premise SharePoint to Azure, ensuring data integrity and scalability.
  • Reduced M365 audit time by 70% by building automated data ingestion and validation pipelines.
June 2018 – June 2022

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Deployed scheduled Azure DevOps jobs to consolidate application logs from 18 distributed servers into a unified database.
  • Built the Eurofins travel request portal, slashing processing time from 10 days to 3 and enabling real-time cost analysis with Power BI.
  • Created a C# web app to manage and display dynamic email distribution lists (1600+ entries) for over 60,000 users.

Signature Projects

Showcasing my skills through practical application.

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based pipeline to scrape Amazon & Peloton reviews, process data with PySpark, store in PostgreSQL, and visualize insights on an interactive Streamlit dashboard.
